head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LINDNER, LORRAINE M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LINDNER, LORRAINE M.

block.p: LINDNER--Lorraine M., 55 year resident of Levittown, on April 23, 2007. Beloved wife of the late William G. (Past International President TWU). Loving mother of William G. (Maureen), Julia V. Waddell (Robert), Jeanne M. Magoshi (Yukimichi) and Christine A. Dear sister of Helen Smith (the late Norman), the late Anna, Leonard, Julia and Jean. Cherished grandmother of Stacie, Carrie, Yukiko, Michio, Jennifer, William, Ryan and Michael. Treasured great-grandmother of Samantha, Sydney and Jocelyn. Dear aunt of many. Alumnus Josephinum Academy, Chicago, IL. Friends may call Thursday, 2-5pm and 79:30pm, at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Homes, Levittown Chapel (2 blocks East of Wantagh Pkwy). Mass Friday, 9:45am at St. Martin of Tours R.C. Church, Bethpage. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury.
